pr_title: Fixes VSCode compiler error related to Scala code

timeline.message:
Fixes VSCode compiler error related to Scala code

Signed-off-by: Paolo Patierno <ppatierno@live.com>

Fixed checkstyle errors

Signed-off-by: Paolo Patierno <ppatierno@live.com>

timeline.bodyText: What's wrong with the name resourceAclsIterator()? Why do you feel compelled to prefix it with get? It's not a getter in the JavaBean sense. And obviously it "gets" something (which depends on its parameter) because it returns non-void?
timeline.author: tombentley
